entry.title: Download Single folder from github repo

entry.summary: Many times you want to download only a single folder from a github repo but unfortunately github doesnâ€™t not provide any official feature to do this. But recently I came across one very useful website for downloading single folder. How to download single folder Step 1 Go to https://download-directory.github.io/ Step 2 Enter the github repo url with folder path and hit enter For example, yo...
